reviews.review: rapaz, tem oq dizer não. É tipo cs 1.6, mas tem historia, gostei não!

Contains a lot of memories of my Childhood. It was one of the only games I had a couple years back. I didn't had Internet back then and was playing on a crappy laptop. This game never disappointed me. I played it every day and played every map many times. The expert bots can kill you in a matter of milliseconds. Nostalgic Times.
прохождение этой игры топ но ньюфагам не понять ^-^
Пожалуй, забытая многими часть контры, где есть сюжет и улучшенные текстуры. Советую поиграть!

Fez parte e ainda faz parte da minha vida, um grande jogo que recomendo para todos!

Sou viciado em CS desde a seu lançamento há 20 anos. Jogava em lan-houses e hoje jogo em casa, quase sempre sozinho porque minha rede não é essas coisas. Espero que relancem esse jogo com novas atualizações no futuro. É bem mais leve do que a última versão Global e dá para jogar em qualquer equipamento simples como o meu Celeron.
Лишний сингл, унылые карты и пушки. Лучше играть в оригинал.

闪退是输入法问题，玩游戏时开着大写锁定或者换成电脑自带的英文输入就行了
任务模式是真的好玩

Trae también un modo con objetivos para cumplir y los diálogos de los bots están mejor hechos.

Jedna z nejhorších videoher které jsem kdy hrál. Ježiši Kriste, tahle sračka nezestárla dobře. Absolutní Call of Duty kampaň v CS 1.6 hábitu. Schopnosti AI a rozmístění nepřátel a jejich spawnování za mojí prdelí mi dávaly migrény. Tohle je jako nějaký středoškolský fan-projekt, ne Counter-Strike spin-off za 8€.
队友是笨比BOT，对面电脑是参数拉满

Probably my favorite old CS game, since it has the single player missions. I would definitely buy this over CS:S.
Plus you get this along with 1.6 for the price of source, so yeah this is a pretty good one. 3.5/5
Better looking CS 1.6. Has less servers but is quite fun. Also not many cheaters at all because of it's low popularity.

So, i played CS:CZ DC more then CS:CZ so i will review CS:CZ DC. So, game is not so comfortable cause of graphics but the game was created at March 23, 2004 so i will not keep an eye on that. Game is pretty cool because of gameplay. Gameplay is better then 99.9% of games that exist! So, i will recommend this game.

No pesa mucho , no consume mucho memoria ram , no necesitas una buena pc y puedes jugar desde tu trabajo como lo hago yo (claro sin que nadie te descubra) bueno para matar el tiempo mientras no tienes clientes que atender.

Super jeu vraiment. Perso j'adore. Par contre moi je jeu plante après 3h de jeu environ en campagne : niveau "reconnaissance" au moment ou je dois sortir du bâtiment. Le jeu crash et se ferme... un peu déçu du coup...
Mais sinon c'était 3h de jeu de pur plaisir !!
I keep coming back to this game over and over again
